snippet.title: DEAD OR ALIVE 6 - Momiji and Ninja Costume Pack Trailer
snippet.description:
Momiji the Dragon Shrine Maiden from the Hayabusa village, has returned after achieving new heights of her training with Ryu Hayabusa! Her new abilities will send her foes flying in the air as she continues to strike them with her own unique attacks.

There will be costumes to unlock in game for her as well as new Command training, Combo Challenges and DOA Quests. Please make sure to check out all the playable modes with Momiji!

Debut set for Momiji will also be available which includes Deluxe Costume, Happy Wedding Costume, Pirates of the 7 Seas Costume, Seaside Eden Costume and Summer Breeze.

Along with the release of Momiji will be the Ninja Costume pack to celebrate the 15th Anniversary of Ninja Gaiden. These costumes can transform mid-fight in specific situations like a Break Blow. Finish your opponents with style fighters. All of this is included in Season Pass 2 or you can purchase separately.

DEAD OR ALIVE 6 is available now for purchase on PlayStation4, Xbox One and Steam for PC
https://teamninja-studio.com/doa6/us/products.html

Try DOA6: Core Fighters FREE!
https://teamninja-studio.com/doa6/us/corefighters.html

Keep up with the #DOA6WC fighters!
https://teamninja-studio.com/doa6/us/wc_standings.html

[official twitter] https://twitter.com/DOATEC_OFFICIAL
[official twitch] https://twitch.tv/Deadoralivegame
[official facebook] https://facebook.com/deadoralivegame
#DOA6 #DEADORALIVE6 #NinjaGaiden
